ads: **Hey! Beta Version of me is here!** type epic>invite to invite it!
Hey! Did you know you can add your ads here? invite the beta version of me and type epic~adsapply to get started!
**Hey! Need help/Found some bugs or exploit? No problem! type epic>ticket! If you need support asap, type epic>quicksupport or join our support server by typing epic>support!**
**Hey!** Do you want an anti spam feature? Please type | epic>ticket yes or epic>ticket no | to vote!
